mapper.select: SELECT A.SIQ_NO AS SIQ_NO, (SELECT SMB_ID FROM SPOMATCH_MEMBER WHERE SMB_NO = A.SMB_NO) AS SMB_ID, A.SIQ_SUBJECT AS SIQ_SUBJECT, A.SIQ_CONTENT AS SIQ_CONTENT, A.SIQ_DELETEYN AS SIQ_DELETEYN, TO_CHAR(A.SIQ_INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SIQ_INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.SIQ_UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SIQ_UPDATEDATE, A.SMB_NO AS SMB_NO, A.SPG_TABLENO AS SPG_TABLENO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPOMATCH_ANSWER C WHERE A.SIQ_NO = C.SIQ_NO AND C.SAW_DELETEYN = 'Y') AS ANCNT FROM SPOMATCH_INQUIRE A, (SELECT * FROM SPOMATCH_MEMBER WHERE SMB_NO = #{smb_no}) B WHERE A.SIQ_DELETEYN = 'Y'

SELECT A.SIQ_NO, A.SIQ_SUBJECT, A.SIQ_CONTENT, A.SIQ_DELETEYN, A.SIQ_INSERTDATE, A.SIQ_UPDATEDATE, A.SMB_NO, (SELECT SMB_ID FROM SPOMATCH_MEMBER WHERE SMB_NO = A.SMB_NO) AS SMB_ID, A.SPG_TABLENO FROM SPOMATCH_INQUIRE A WHERE SIQ_NO = #{siq_no} AND SIQ_DELETEYN = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'Q'||LPAD ( (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(INQUIRE_NO_PK)*/ NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(SIQ_NO,-4)),0)+1COMMNO FROM SPOMATCH_INQUIRE A ),4,'0')FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SPOMATCH_INQUIRE ( SIQ_NO, SIQ_SUBJECT, SIQ_CONTENT, SIQ_DELETEYN, SIQ_INSERTDATE, SIQ_UPDATEDATE, SMB_NO, SPG_TABLENO ) VALUES ( #{siq_no}, #{siq_subject}, #{siq_content}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{smb_no}, '06' )
mapper.update: UPDATE SPOMATCH_INQUIRE A SET A.SIQ_SUBJECT = #{siq_subject}, A.SIQ_CONTENT = #{siq_content}, A.SIQ_UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE A.SIQ_NO = #{siq_no} AND A.SIQ_DELETEYN = 'Y'
UPDATE SPOMATCH_INQUIRE A SET A.SIQ_DELETEYN = 'N', A.SIQ_UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE A.SIQ_NO = #{siq_no}
